title: Zomato Gold mini scam
selftext: Same items added. Left one is a Zomato gold screenshot, right one is no membership. Somehow GST is different even though same items are added. Furthermore, no membership account gets the same order roughly 120 Rs cheaper (after applying a coupon which is unavailable for gold members). Even if we remove  72 Rs delivery charges, it is still expensive on Gold by around 50 Rs
comments: Laal hai ðŸ”´laal hai ðŸ”´â€¦.. Sara khela laal hai !!

Hmmm, thnx for sharing this

I also want to add that GST on NIC is generally high, like I have seen this high GST now a few times. You should try buying this physically too, you might get for a low price.

You should probably contact the customer service of zomato too, they might help if this is a glitch or something, or this might be a slight fraud they are doing with customers.
